Monsieur Thomas A comedy. Acted at the Private House in Blacke Fryers. The author, Iohn Fletcher, Gent. Fletcher, John, 1579-1625. Brome, Richard, d. 1652?
[96] p.
Printed by Thomas Harper, for Iohn Waterson, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Crowne, London : 1639.
Editor's dedication signed: Richard Brome. In verse. Signatures: [pi]¹ A² B-M⁴ N¹ ([pi]1 prob. = N2). Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
